thread.title: Forrest Rode

author: Forrest Rode
title: Forrest Rode
text: I ordered a camera from Beach Camera. It works great and arrived quickly. It is a refurbished Olympus Tough and looks like new. I got tired of replacing other cameras every year and went back to the Olympus. I had one before that stood up to everything except falling off the roof of my car at 70 MPH. I go in the mountains in all kinds of weather, and it stands up.
